UI package¶

Submodules¶

UI.labsystem_facade module¶

UI.menu module¶

Represents a menu.

class UI.menu.Menu(name)[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents a menu with various options.

Attributes: - name (str): The name of the menu. - items (list): The list of menu items. - option (str): The selected menu option. - exit_option (str): The option to exit the menu. - color (str): The color of the menu text.

add_item(item)[source]¶

Add an item to the menu.

Args: - item (str): The item to be added to the menu.

change_exit_option(option)[source]¶

Change the exit option of the menu.

Args: - option (str): The new exit option.

print_menu()[source]¶

Print the menu with colored text.

run()[source]¶

Run the menu until the exit option is selected.

run_function(option)[source]¶

Run the function associated with the selected menu option.

Args: - option (str): The selected menu option.

set_color(color)[source]¶

Set the color of the menu text.

Args: - color (str): The color to be set.

set_menu_option()[source]¶

Set the selected menu option.

UI.menu_item module¶

Represents a menu item.

class UI.menu_item.Item(item_id, name, function=None, args=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents a menu item.

id¶

The ID of the item.

Type:

int

name¶

The name of the item.

Type:

str

function¶

The function to be executed when the item is selected.

Type:

function, optional

args¶

The arguments to be passed to the function.

Type:

list, optional

__str__()[source]¶

Returns a string representation of the item.
